text: Is there a DateTime function that returns the dates of the start and end of the week?  It wouldn’t be too difficult to make (see thread), but perhaps I missed something in the docs.

elements.text: Is there a DateTime function that returns the dates of the start and end of the week?  It wouldn’t be too difficult to make (see thread), but perhaps I missed something in the docs.

text:
```function weekof(d::Date)
    m, s = d, d
    
    if Dates.ismonday(d)
        m = d
    else
        while ! Dates.ismonday(m)
            m -= Day(1)
        end
    end
    
    if Dates.issunday(d)
        s = d
    else
        while ! Dates.issunday(s)
            s += Day(1)
        end
    end
    
    return m, s
end```

elements.text:
function weekof(d::Date)
    m, s = d, d
    
    if Dates.ismonday(d)
        m = d
    else
        while ! Dates.ismonday(m)
            m -= Day(1)
        end
    end
    
    if Dates.issunday(d)
        s = d
    else
        while ! Dates.issunday(s)
            s += Day(1)
        end
    end
    
    return m, s
end

text: Those seem to take longer than my solution though?  Oh well, I’m not too worried about time
